model_answer:
The reason for the change in the hash bond depiction is option A: In Edit → Preferences, the “Invert wedge hashes” checkbox was selected in GChemPaint Preferences, making wedge–hash bonds follow the usual convention with narrow start and broad end.
To access these preferences, open GChemPaint and go to Edit → Preferences. In the preferences window, navigate to the “Wedge Hashes” section and select the “invert” checkbox. The changes will take effect after clicking “OK”.
